description:
Brand new, spacious and beautifully decorated, this apartment will make you feel right at home. The location is ideal. Everything is brand new.
The space is spacious with a lot of daylight. The bedroom has a king bed with memory foam mattress. it's very comfortable for couple.
The living room has a brand new sofa. All the furniture is brand new and designed with a great style.

My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers.

Very trendy young neighborhood with a lot of cool bars and restaurants.

Just one block away to the subway L train.

NO parties
NO shoes 
NO friends over
name: Duplex 1 bedroom apartment in prime Williamsburg
review: The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
